sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: AAV CAMKII PSAM4 GlyR IRES EGFP was a gift from Scott Sternson (Addgene plasmid # 119744 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:119744 ; RRID:Addgene_119744) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 119744) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 119744-AAV5)
